title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies in Practice: Language Project-Based Learning Using Nonlinear Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design the goals and methods of language projects through nonlinear instructional approaches.
Learners can develop and apply at least three creative language expression strategies in an open-ended task environment.
Learners can revise and improve project deliverables at least twice by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
